overview:
Greg Alvo is the Founder and CEO of OrderGroove, responsible for setting the overall strategic direction for the company and overseeing day-to-day operations. Greg founded OrderGroove in 2008 with the vision of improving lifetime value and retention for eCommerce.

Prior to OrderGroove, Greg held a variety of Sales and Business Development roles at Liquidation.com, a $250million B2B overstock eCommerce marketplace, where he was responsible for signing partnerships with some of the largest retailers, manufacturers and distributors in the world to handle their excess inventory through Liquidation.comâ€™s marketplace. In 2006, Liquidation.com went public on the NASDAQ during a successful IPO (LQDT).
